extension.name: PLG_CONTENT_CROWDFUNDINGSHARE
extension.author: Todor Iliev
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2014 Todor Iliev ( ITPrism.com ). All rights reserved.
extension.description:
CrowdFunding - Share is a plugin that adds block with sharing buttons and code for embedding. These things can be used from users to share the project with their friends.

Subscribe for the newsletter to receive information about updates and new ITPrism extensions.

Please, vote for the extension on Joomla! Extensions Directory

field.name: facebookLikeFont
field.label: Facebook Like Font
field.description: The font to display in the button. Options: 'arial', 'lucida grande', 'segoe ui', 'tahoma', 'trebuchet ms', 'verdana'
